statements: SELECT * FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews
SELECT review_text, rating FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews
SELECT user_id, location FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews WHERE rating > 4.0
SELECT review_id, user_id, experience_date FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews ORDER BY experience_date DESC
SELECT * FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating, location FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY experience_date ASC;
SELECT review_id, user_id, rating, location FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews WHERE location = 'Mountain' ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT review_id, user_id, review_text, rating, experience_date FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC, experience_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating, location FROM outdoor_adventure_reviews WHERE experience_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE sport_name = 'Basketball';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT sport_name, review_text FROM user_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM sport_experiences WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND duration_hours > 2;
SELECT experience_id, sport_name, difficulty_level FROM sport_experiences ORDER BY experience_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC
SELECT user_id, review_text FROM user_reviews WHERE sport_name='Tennis' AND rating >= 3.5
SELECT sport_name, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM user_reviews GROUP BY sport_name ORDER BY review_count DESC
SELECT sport_name, location, difficulty_level FROM sport_experiences WHERE duration_hours > 2 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM user_reviews JOIN sport_experiences ON user_reviews.sport_name = sport_experiences.sport_name
SELECT * FROM user_reviews;
SELECT user_id, review_text, rating FROM user_reviews;
SELECT experience_id, activity_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM experiences;
SELECT review_id, user_id, experience_id, review_text, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT user_id, review_text, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT u.username, ur.rating, e.activity_name FROM users u JOIN user_reviews ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN experiences e ON e.experience_id = ur.experience_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%john%'
SELECT u.username, e.location, ur.review_text FROM users u, user_reviews ur, experiences e WHERE u.user_id = ur.user_id AND ur.experience_id = e.experience_id ORDER BY u.username ASC

SELECT DISTINCT u.username, e.activity_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_reviews ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN experiences e ON ur.experience_id = e.experience_id WHERE u.registration_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users
SELECT review_id, rating FROM user_reviews
SELECT experience_name, location FROM adventure_experiences
SELECT * FROM ratings
SELECT * FROM user_reviews;
SELECT user_id, review_text, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT experience_name, location FROM adventure_experiences WHERE location = 'California';

SELECT u.username, ae.experience_name, r.rating_value FROM users u JOIN ratings r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN adventure_experiences ae ON r.experience_id = ae.experience_id ORDER BY r.rating_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews;
SELECT review_id, user_id, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT sport_name, location, duration_hours FROM sports_experiences ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE sport_experience_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT sport_name, location, duration_hours FROM sports_experiences WHERE duration_hours > 5 ORDER BY sport_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, avg_rating FROM ratings WHERE num_reviews > 10 AND avg_rating >= 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC, num_reviews ASC;
SELECT image_url FROM images WHERE sport_experience_id = 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM user_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
